name: Go to 'Sign In' modal inside 'Account' modal, type valid password, click 'Forgot Password' button and check message

steps.name: Open 'Sign In' modal, check that 'Sign In' modal is visible and check modal header's text
wait until 'Account' modal becomes visible and element inside it
get text from 'Sign In' modal header
get text from clue under 'Email' or 'Password' fields inside 'Sign In' modal
